issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I have installed titanium on the iMac. When I try to use the iPhone simulator I get: [ERROR] "build" is an unrecognized command. I also cannot update, it says: 
Error encountered during update
Error extracting zip file - /var/folders/6d/tt6h4psx7xs13ctl_x4j25j40000gn/T/mobilesdk-3.1.2.GA-osx
archive is not a ZIP archive
fields.summary: get build error & cannot update titanium

comments.body:
Hi Angela King,

you check your internet connection and Uninstall the node and again try to update or Uninstall the titanium studio and reinstall it then try to update.

Thanks
Thanks, I have actually done this 3 times & I always get the same error. What can I try next?

Please try to download the file directly from this http://builds.appcelerator.com.s3.amazonaws.com/index.html#3_1_X and then unzip it. Place it to your application folder and then run the installation. If you still get this, please try to post a Question in our Developer Q/A here http://developer.appcelerator.com/questions/newest .

[~ange666] We have resolved a number of installation and upgrade issues with the latest release 3.2.0 GA Studio and SDK. I would appreciate if you can give it a try and let us know if you can reproduce the issue. We would be happy to troubleshoot this issue with you.
